185568494.review:
My gaming experience thus far had been Nintendo DS (Pokemon, MarioKart) and a laptop (Skyrim, New Vegas, HuniePop, etc). So my genre tastes never led me to experiencing the CoD franchise growing up. That said, this game gives me a nostalgia as if I had.

It was beyond easy to pick up despite having very little shooter experience other than a brief month on CS:GO back in 2017, and VATS-assisted attacks in Fallout NV and 4. I really only died to my own idiocy (not using cover, standing still while reloading, etc.). There were no performance issues or glitches, though it doesn't want to Alt-Tab when full screened.

Personal note: I had a moment during the tutorial when they describe how the minimap and objective markers work, because it's so easy to forget that the things we take for granted in games had to start somewhere. Yellow/white parkour starters or interactibles, even button keybinds that are the standard today, all had to start as a conscious choice.

185411186.review:
My recommendation: get it....but not for this price.
I have 3 thoughts on the game:
[olist]
[*]Works surprisingly well
[*]Higher difficulties are literal hell....but man if I'm not a sucker for classic, WWII FPS .
[*]It is nuts to see mechanics that exist in some of the most recent COD games in this game.
[/olist]

And then I have 2 thoughts on the price:
[olist]
[*]Maybe COD games should be the global currency, since their value is apparently the most stable thing in the economy.
[*]SteamDB has price history....so there's that
[*]The COD Warchest comes with COD 2 and the United Offensive DLC for this game, which is almost 3 games. Even if that's not a fair price, its a better deal than this.
[/olist]

185238353.review:
[h1]量產長青消費娛樂品牌的開始[/h1]
21世紀交替之時，我逐漸從Quake 3與UT逐漸轉移到CS與BF上
CS是現代題材，而BF 1942的gunplay在當時又是極為糟糕 (你經歷過跳跳樂應該就知道)
然後又被MOH與DOD吸引目光去

2003年，松崗代理了COD，當時在超商上架demo版實體光碟引起了我的注意

拿回去一試那可真是不得了....有ADS，那個gunplay的感受可超越了MOH與DOD
(雖然往後那幾年只要是WW2的休閒對抗我還是比較喜歡DOD)
故事演出的方式，龍套變多比起MOH更熱鬧的氣氛，MOH可以直接蛋雕了
在WW2休閒打槍題材上還真沒遊戲賣得過COD，怎麼賣怎麼賺

直到2007年、直到2024年，那就是另外的事了

184667832.review: Definitely worth going back to and appreciating it for what it started. Sure, its dated and you'll find yourself overwhelmed easily even on the regular difficulty setting particularly in the Pavlov's House level. All the missions are based on the actual military operations that were going on at the time and it's charming to look at actual pictures of the places you visit in the game and seeing them line up with the photographs. There's still a couple of servers still active surprisingly and it's no issue getting a game started up.

184546264.review:
Skvělá hra na svou dobu. I po letech je hezké si jí zahrát. Na netu se dá najít amatérský dabing do češtiny. V tomto spojení je zážitek ještě lepší. Grafická stránka na dnešní dobu je spíše směšná, ale ve své době si myslím na velmi dobré úrovni. Doporučuji si zahrát tuto hru každému, kdo má rád WWII. V rámci příběhu vystřídáte role Sovětů, Američanů i Britů.

Body recenze:

Klady:

+Grafika - Na svou dobu je dobrá
+Počet frakci 
+Optimalizace - neměl jsem snad jediný problém
+Na svou dobu dobré zvuky zbraní

Zápory:

-Stejný styl misí

85%

184475135.review:
"Мамочка, знамя нашей родины уже несколько дней развивается над берлинским Рейхстагом. Похоже, что война наконец подошла к концу. Враг уже почти не сопротивляется, и я скоро вернусь домой. Здесь повсюду немецкие военнопленные.
Сегодня я переправился через немецкую реку Эльбу и пожал руку американскому солдату. Хотя я не понимал, что он мне говорит, мне казалось, что я встретил брата, и, по-моему, он чувствовал тоже самое."

184266658.review: Call of Duty (2003) offers an intense and immersive experience with its well-crafted campaigns. While the number of missions can feel overwhelming at times, it's a journey well worth taking. Despite being from 2003, the game's graphics hold up and add to the charm rather than detract from it. Don't let the age of the graphics deter you—this game is a classic that deserves to be played and appreciated for its storytelling and gameplay.

183942022.review:
Se ti piace sparare, è molto divertente anche se è vecchio di 21 anni, me lo sono mangiato in pochi giorni.
È anche abbastanza cinematografico (ma è imbarazzante confrontato con Halo che uscì due anni prima e se lo mangia sotto ogni punto di vista)
È tutta una serie di livelli in cui cambi pov (quello russo è il migliore), da un certo punto in poi diventa MOLTO importante nascondersi e strisciare per terra o ti distruggono. Certi livelli mi ho dovuti rifare PER ORE e giocavo anche a normale! 
Beh siccome mi sono divertito tanto, hype per i prossimi.
Gameplay: 4/5
Storia: boh/5
Musica: ascoltavo la mia musica su youtube/5
Longevità: 12 ore/5
Livello sborrata: 0/5 (nessuno sborrabile 😒)

183941876.review: The original CoD shooter follows several stories of actual combat, re-imagined and presented for YOU to enjoy. Missions scale dramatically in difficulty with each campaign: The Americans have well-coordinated missions where your equipment and guns are superior; The British feature challenging missions where survival has more to do with your wits and reflexes; the Soviets feature brutal missions where survival has much to do about luck and serious understanding of your position.

183790430.review: Хоть эта игра пропитана антисоветчиной, иногда хочется вспомнить 2000-ые и классно повоевать на фронтах WWII в стиле игр старой школы . Ведь для своего времени игра была настоящим шедевром. Так что это просто классный шутер, не более. Хорошего сюжета или исторической достоверности вы там особо не увидите. В целом, рекомендую даже сейчас!

183735512.review:
Talán nevetségesnek tűnhet hogy így 2024 végén 2025 elején lassan írok értékelést egy 21-22 éves játékról. De én már az a generáció vagyok akinek a születésekor jött ki ez a játék. Így kimaradt az az élmény hogy megjelenéskor játszon vele. 

Felnőtt fejjel 23 évesen nekiültem bepótolni ezt az élményt. Azt kell mondjam le vagyok nyűgözve. Rég kaptam meg ezt a játékélményt. Minden működik nem találkoztam bug-al. Élmény benne lövöldözni a helyszínek változatossága lenyűgözött. A küldetések élvezetesek. A játék újra és újra meglepett. A mai CoD-ok-hoz képest ég és föld. 

Inkább ezt fogom újra és újra játszani mint az Új WWII-es epizódot vagy a szerintem botrányos Vanguard-ot.

183652255.review: Such a great experience this was. This is a game that's filled with memorable action set pieces and knows how to make you feel the way it wants to, one moment you might be a bad-ass commando wiping out Nazis and sabotaging weapons of mass destruction, another you might be a grunt, barely having any ammunition to get to the next point in the battlefield, you might pilot a tank and cause mayhem, or pray to God the next shell doesn't hit you while you crawl across an open field trying your hardest to get to the next building while the enemy rains hell fire upon you.
